document.full_text: japan's economy is already showing signs of recovering from a slump that followed a devastating earthquake in march, bank of japan governor masaaki shirakawa said on wednesday while stressing that the central bank would remain vigilant about economic risks.
document.title: boj sees recovery signs, exports slump taken in
lines_and_colors: japan's economy is already showing signs of recovering from a slump that followed a devastating earthquake in march, bank of japan governor masaaki shirakawa said on wednesday while stressing that the central bank would remain vigilant about economic risks.
